productDescription: Ideal Entertainment with Kids, Families and Friends.
Throw the drone up with the power of arm gently into the air to take off. Make sure there is enough space while throwing the drone up.
Altitude hold function enables to auto-hovering at a fixed height. Subtle adjustment with trimming buttons make flight more controllable.
Just press the Headless button to active the funtion. No confusion in identifying directions under headless mode. Enjoy the fun of flight!
Press the return button and the SNAPTAIN SP310 mini drone will fly towards its back following a path that parallels with its original take-off path.
Four anti-collision protective guards protect the propellers from damage. Do not touch the drone with hand directly while the drone is flying.
The LED indicator allows you to accurately capture your drone in the dark, and blink continuously when the drone is running out of power.
With simple appearance design. Customized drone cabin and accessories storehouse save more space that you can put into your pocket or bag.
